scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix next-client-tv-owl" "npm run dev --prefix node-server-tv-owl" "npm run dev --prefix transcoding-server" "npm run dev --prefix completion-handler-server"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix next-client-tv-owl" "npm run build --prefix node-server-tv-owl"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix next-client-tv-owl" "npm run start --prefix node-server-tv-owl"
